variants.description: Bright blue in color, this slim armor vest was used by volunteers and officials from humanitarian groups during the first days of the Cataclysm before order broke down completely.
This charcoal-colored body armor was once a common sight on police officers, and it provides adequate protection against small-caliber firearms in addition to featuring pouches to hold armor inserts.
Styled in urban camo, this ballistic vest was issued to soldiers, and as things got worse, to volunteers as well.  It was designed to stand out after the chaos of the riots.

description: A large Russian flag, made to fly in even the worst conditions.
A large Ukrainian flag, made to fly in even the worst conditions.
A large Belarusian flag, made to fly in even the worst conditions.
